title: Cannellini bean, tuna and caper salad
ingredients: ['1 tin tuna, drained and flaked', '1/2 red pepper, chopped', '1/2 onion, chopped', 'good handful chopped fresh coriander', '2 tablespoons capers', '4 cornichons', '100g (4 oz) mayonnaise', '100g (4 oz) Dijon mustard', '1/2 400g) tin cannellini beans, drained', 'handful chopped fresh parsley, for garnish']
